name: Princess of Frogs
description:
Navigate a magic forest and a grim hut of a witch to finish this point and click adventure!

A witch, an elderly woman, envious of Vasilisa's youth and beauty turned her into a frog. Find a way to lift the curse and reclaim Vasilisa's human appearance.

- Endure a freezing night by eating any insects and flowers you can catch and find.

- Power your way through an ever changing forest to reach the witch's hut.

- Collect items you find throughout your journey. You never know what might be of use.

- Solve the riddle inside the hut to lift the curse. 

Controls:

Point and click game

Movement: left mouse button

Credits:

Programming - Chaki Behappy

Art - Manta

Story and script - Anigvit
